p: Awale et al. [ 29] found similar cytotoxic effects when comparing Brazilian red propolis extracts and antitumor drugs, such as 5-fluorouracil and doxorubicin, in six tumor cell lines (including HCT-116), thus evidencing the biological potential of this natural matrix. Frozza et al. [ 91] also showed the in vitro antiproliferative effect of Brazilian red propolis against human laryngeal squamous cell carcinoma (Hep-2), human cervical adenocarcinoma cells (HeLa), and normal human embryonic kidney cells (Hek-293).
